definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">data merge entity @s[type=item] {Glowing:1b}</field></block></value></block></next></block><block type="entity_add_potion_advanced" x="200" y="255"><field name="potion">GLOWING</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">9999</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="ambient"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><value name="particles"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block><block type="entity_execute_command" x="41" y="309"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">team join blue @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest]</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">data merge entity @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest,nbt=!{Glowing:1b}] {Glowing:1b}</field></block></value></block></next></block><block type="world_send_chat" x="-40" y="413"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Message</field></block></value></block><block type="logic_entity_compare" x="11" y="598"><field name="entity">EntityItem</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block><block type="entity_is_glowing" x="-47" y="603"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></xml>
